entity.description: Project-wide Rust code quality requirements: 1) Zero clippy warnings with -D warnings flag 2) All code must compile cleanly 3) Comprehensive error handling using thiserror 4) async/await patterns with proper error propagation 5) Unit tests for all public APIs 6) Integration tests for component interaction 7) Structured logging with tracing crate 8) Security: zeroize for sensitive data, secrecy for secrets 9) Performance: avoid unnecessary allocations, use Arc/Rc appropriately 10) Documentation: rustdoc for all public items

requirements.description: All code must compile without warnings using cargo clippy --workspace --all-features -- -D warnings
requirements.title: Zero Clippy Warnings

requirements.description: All functions that can fail must return Result<T, E> with appropriate error types from dots-family-common::error
requirements.title: Comprehensive Error Handling

requirements.description: Use tracing crate with structured logging: info!, debug!, error!, warn! macros with context
requirements.title: Structured Logging

entity.title: Rust Code Quality Standards
